hanzi-su-wiki:
函

Значения

Ящик, коробка

Мнемоника

Деформировано. Рот с языком (в центре), который то высовывается, то убирается назад. В широком смысле — выдвижной или почтовый ящик, куда письма то кладут, то вынимают.

Варианты

凾
purpleculture_pinyin:
hán
envelope; case; letter
конверт; дело; письмо
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Letters placed in a container 凵
purpleculture_examples:
函数 [ hán shù ]: function (math.)
致函 [ zhì hán ]: to send a letter
信函 [ xìn hán ]: letter; piece of correspondence (incl. email)
函授 [ hán shòu ]: to teach by correspondence
来函 [ lái hán ]: incoming letter; letter from afar; same as 来信

    • ⿻ Overlaid

heisig_chinese_memo: Damn racoons ill show them. I wrote a welcome letter for them, put a snare in the bin as well as a few phosphorous sparklers so as to scare the shit out of the buggers as they rummag-ed through my bin.
heisig_story: This is the character from which the element for shovel derives. Within it comes the element for snare, with the sparkler surrounding it.
koohiiStory1: Damn racoons ill show them. I put a snare in the bin as well as a few phosphorous sparklers so as to scare the shit out of the buggers as they rummage through my bin.
koohiiStory2: (thegeezer3) Damn racoons... I´ll show them. I´ll put a SNARE in the BIN as well as a few SPARKLERS so as to scare the shit out of the buggers, then hit them with a SHOVEL.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the open box (凵) with one (一) (lot of) water (⺢) is a box
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Damn racoons ill show them. I wrote a welcome letter for them, put a snare in the bin as well as a few phosphorous sparklers so as to scare the shit out of the buggers as they rummag-ed through my bin.
humanum_full_description_en:
In the letter from the back arrow of the Jia Jinwen (the parts are represented by ◎), the official title is "圅", which is like a bag or box for storing arrows. The original meaning is a quiver or quiver. Around the glyph, there may be two small circles on the left and right, or only one of the oracle bone inscriptions. There is a small circle on the upper right side of the inscriptions. The small circle is like a small circle that can be used in the hand. The small circle becomes " 𢎘 " in the small seal. (Hán) Xu Shen thinks it is a sound note. Han Dynasty text inverted sagittal strokes gradually leveled two horizontal, and then disconnect the four pens, falsely as " water " shape, " Han " is then the " letter ."

In ancient times, there were two kinds of tools for holding arrows. One was called " Han ", which was a box specially used to store arrows, which contained the entire arrow. "Mandarin. "Lu Yu": "Golden arrow letter to make the request"; one is called " Xiao ", which is used when shooting arrows. After being loaded, the tail (bracket) of the arrow and part of the arrow (ie the arrow shaft) are exposed. In order to draw the arrow and launch it at any time (see Wang Guowei). See "箙", "备".

Later, " letters " were also used to refer to various collection instruments, such as "Jin Shu. "Zhang Hua Chuan" "Dug the foundation of the prison house, enter the ground for more than four feet, get a stone letter", "Stone Letter", that is, "Stone Chamber", "Ji Yun. "Xian Yun": "Han, Kui Ye. Or as 㮀." The mirror box can also be called "Mirror Letter", the sword room can also be called "Sword Letter", the outer shell of the letter, the envelope of the book, the armor of the body, etc. It is called " Han " and is widely used (Wang Fengyang). Later, the meaning of box and envelope was extended to contain and contain.

Oracle is used as the place name, "Tunnan": "Cai (in) 圅".

Clementine is falsely " trapped, " and Mao Gongding: "The vulgar (desire) female (ru) is in a difficult situation." It means I hope you don't put your monarch into a difficult situation. It is also used as the surname, Huang's father: "Yu Huang's father Zha (made) Zhou 㜏 (妘)匜", "匜" is a vessel for holding water, which means that Emperor Huang's father cast this 匜 for Zhou.

"Said Wen": "圅 (letter), tongue also. Pictogram, tongue body 𢎘𢎘. From 𢎘, 𢎘 also sound. 肣, common 圅 from meat, today."
humanum_short_description_en: In the letter from the back arrow (the parts are represented by ◎), it is like a bag or box for storing arrows. The small circle on the upper right is like a small ring for hand-carrying. The original meaning is a quiver or quiver. The extension is to contain and contain.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從倒矢在函（部件用◎表示）中，隸定作「圅」，象收藏箭矢的袋子或盒子，本義是箭袋、箭匣。在字形的周邊，甲骨文或有左右兩個小圈圈，或只有一個，金文多在右上有一個小圈圈，象可以用手提的小環，小圈圈在小篆中訛變為「𢎘」（hán），許慎認為是聲符。漢代文字倒矢形的筆畫漸漸拉平為兩橫，後又斷開為四筆，訛成「水」形，「圅」於是變為「函」。

　　古時盛箭的器具有兩種，一種稱「函」，指專門用來收藏箭矢的匣子，把整支箭都包裹在內，《國語．魯語》：「使求得之金櫝矢函」；一稱「箙」，是射箭時所用的，盛載以後，箭的尾部（矢括）和一部分矢笴（即箭杆）露在外，以便抽出箭矢，隨時發射（參王國維）。參見「箙」、「備」。

　　後來也用「函」來指各種收藏器具，如《晉書．張華傳》「掘獄屋基，入地四丈餘，得一石函」，「石函」，即「石匱」，《集韻．咸韻》：「函，匱也。或作㮀。」鏡匣也可以叫「鏡函」，劍室也可以叫「劍函」，信件的外殼、書的封套、護身的鎧甲等也都可以叫「函」，應用較廣泛（王鳳陽）。後來匣子、封套的意思引申為包含、容納。

　　甲骨文用作地名，《屯南》：「才（在）圅」。

　　金文通假為「陷」，毛公鼎：「俗（欲）女（汝）弗以乃辟圅（陷）於艱。」意謂希望你不要使你的君主陷入艱難的境地。又用作姓氏，圅皇父匜：「圅皇父乍（作）周㜏（妘）匜」，「匜」是盛水的器皿，意謂圅皇父為周妘鑄造了這件匜。

　　《說文》：「圅（函），舌也。象形，舌體𢎘𢎘。从𢎘，𢎘亦聲。肣，俗圅从肉、今。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從倒矢在函（部件用◎表示）中，象收藏箭矢的袋子或盒子，右上的小圈圈象一個用來手提的小環，本義是箭袋、箭匣。引申為包含、容納。

甲金文從倒矢在函（部件用◎表示）中，隸定作「 圅 」，象收藏箭矢的袋子或盒子，本義是箭袋、箭匣。在字形的周邊，甲骨文或有左右兩個小圈圈，或只有一個，金文多在右上有一個小圈圈，象可以用手提的小環，小圈圈在小篆中訛變為「 𢎘 」（hán），許慎認為是聲符。漢代文字倒矢形的筆畫漸漸拉平為兩橫，後又斷開為四筆，訛成「 水 」形，「 圅 」於是變為「 函 」。 古時盛箭的器具有兩種，一種稱「 函 」，指專門用來收藏箭矢的匣子，把整支箭都包裹在內，《國語．魯語》：「使求得之金櫝矢函」；一稱「 箙 」，是射箭時所用的，盛載以後，箭的尾部（矢括）和一部分矢笴（即箭杆）露在外，以便抽出箭矢，隨時發射（參王國維）。參見「 箙 」、「 備 」。 後來也用「 函 」來指各種收藏器具，如《晉書．張華傳》「掘獄屋基，入地四丈餘，得一石函」，「石函」，即「石匱」，《集韻．咸韻》：「函，匱也。或作㮀。」鏡匣也可以叫「鏡函」，劍室也可以叫「劍函」，信件的外殼、書的封套、護身的鎧甲等也都可以叫「 函 」，應用較廣泛（王鳳陽）。後來匣子、封套的意思引申為包含、容納。 甲骨文用作地名，《屯南》：「才（在）圅」。 金文通假為「 陷 」，毛公鼎：「俗（欲）女（汝）弗以乃辟圅（陷）於艱。」意謂希望你不要使你的君主陷入艱難的境地。又用作姓氏，圅皇父匜：「圅皇父乍（作）周㜏（妘）匜」，「 匜 」是盛水的器皿，意謂圅皇父為周妘鑄造了這件匜。 《說文》：「圅（函），舌也。象形，舌體𢎘𢎘。从𢎘，𢎘亦聲。肣，俗圅从肉、今。」
In the letter from the back arrow of the Jia Jinwen (the parts are represented by ◎), the official title is " 圅", which is like a bag or box for storing arrows. The original meaning is a quiver or quiver. Around the glyph, there may be two small circles on the left and right, or only one of the oracle bone inscriptions. There is a small circle on the upper right side of the inscriptions. The small circle is like a small circle that can be used in the hand. The small circle becomes " 𢎘" in the small seal. (Hán) Xu Shen thinks it is a sound note. Han Dynasty text inverted sagittal strokes gradually leveled two horizontal, and then disconnect the four pens, falsely as " water" shape, " Han" is then the " letter." In ancient times, there were two kinds of tools for holding arrows. One was called " Han", which was a box specially used to store arrows, which contained the entire arrow. "Mandarin. "Lu Yu": "Golden arrow letter to make the request"; one is called " Xiao", which is used when shooting arrows. After being loaded, the tail (bracket) of the arrow and part of the arrow (ie the arrow shaft) are exposed. In order to draw the arrow and launch it at any time (see Wang Guowei). See " 箙", " 备". Later, " letters" were also used to refer to various collection instruments, such as "Jin Shu. "Zhang Hua Chuan" "Dug the foundation of the prison house, enter the ground for more than four feet, get a stone letter", "Stone Letter", that is, "Stone Chamber", "Ji Yun. "Xian Yun": "Han, Kui Ye. Or as 㮀." The mirror box can also be called "Mirror Letter", the sword room can also be called "Sword Letter", the outer shell of the letter, the envelope of the book, the armor of the body, etc. It is called " Han" and is widely used (Wang Fengyang). Later, the meaning of box and envelope was extended to contain and contain. Oracle is used as the place name, "Tunnan": "Cai (in) 圅". Clementine is falsely " trapped," and Mao Gongding: "The vulgar (desire) female (ru) is in a difficult situation." It means I hope you don't put your monarch into a difficult situation. It is also used as the surname, Huang's father: "Yu Huang's father Zha (made) Zhou 㜏 (妘)匜", " 匜" is a vessel for holding water, which means that Emperor Huang's father cast this 匜 for Zhou. "Said Wen": "圅 (letter), tongue also. Pictogram, tongue body 𢎘𢎘. From 𢎘, 𢎘 also sound. 肣, common 圅 from meat, today."

函字的基本解释

函
hán
匣，盒子：石函。剑函。
套子，引申为量词：书函。信一函（信一封）。
信件：函件。公函。来函。
包含，容纳：函夏（“夏”，指中国；“函夏”即包括整个中国）。巨蚌函珠。
铠甲：函人（制甲的人）。

函字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hán］
［《廣韻》胡男切，平覃，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡讒切，平咸，匣。］
亦作“凾1”。亦作“圅1”。“椷2”的被通假字。亦作“肣1”。
(1)包含；容纳。
(2)铠甲。
(3)造甲的人。
(4)喻密布周围，形成保卫圈。
(5)匣子；封套。
(6)用匣子或封套装盛。
(7)书信。
(8)致函；去信。
(9)犹今之涵洞。
(10)函谷关的省称。

函字的英文翻译

◎ 函
case, envelop, letter

函字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【凵字部】　函； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页135第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡男切，音含。【說文】舌也，又容也。【禮·曲禮】席閒函丈。又【前漢·禮樂志郊祀歌】函蒙祉福常若期。【註】師古曰：函，包也。又【前漢·班固敘傳】函之如海。【註】讀與含同。【律歷志】太極函三爲一。【禮·樂志】人函隂陽之氣。又【玉篇】鎧也。【周禮·冬官考工記】燕非無函也，夫人而能爲函也。又【集韻】戸感切，音頷。【通俗文】口上曰臄，口下曰函。【集韻】或作椷。【前漢·天文志】太白閒可椷劒。【註】謂可容一劒也。又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】胡讒切【正韻】胡嵒切，?音咸。匱也。又【集韻】或作㮀，木名。又或作䤴。【博雅】介鎧也，通作函。又【玉篇】書也。【晉書·殷浩傳】竟達空函。又姓。【廣韻】漢有豫章太守函熙。又漢複姓。漢末有黃門侍郞函治子覺。又函谷，關名。又通作咸。【周禮·秋官】伊耆氏共杖咸。【註】咸讀爲函，以此藏杖也。又【張有·復古編】圅又作函，亦筆迹小異。別作凾，非。

考證：〔【前漢·禮樂志郊祀
函字的源字形

函字的起名意思

：一般指信件，信封；也指包含，包容，宽阔等含义。

letter
Basic explanation of words
letter
hán
Box, box: stone letter. Sword letter.
Cover, extended to quantifier: book letter. Letter one letter (one letter).
Letter: Letter. Official letter. Letter.
Include, contain: Han Xia ("Xia" refers to China; "Han Xia" includes the entire China). Giant clam letter beads.
Armor: Hanren (the person who makes armor).
letter
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hán]
["Guangyun" Hu Nanqie, Pingtan, Xia. ]
["Guangyun" Hu slander cut, plain and salty, box. ]
Also known as "凾1". Also known as "圅1". The false word for "椷2" was passed. Also known as "肣1".
(1) Contain; contain.
(2) Armor.
(3) People who make armor.
(4) Yu densely spreads around, forming a defensive circle.
(5) Box; envelope.
(6) Use a box or a sealed suit to hold it.
(7) Letters.
(8) To write a letter; to write a letter.
(9) Culverts still present.
(10) The provincial name of Hangu Pass.
letter
English translation of words
◎ Letter
case, envelop, letter
letter
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Ji Zi Department] 　 Han; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 135 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Nanqie, with sound. [Said the text] The tongue is also full. 【Li·Qu Li】Xian Xian Han Zhang. Also [Former Han·Liyuezhi Jiao Si Song] Hanmeng welfare is always like a period of time. [Note] Shi Gu said: Letter, Baoye. Also [Previous Han·Bangguxu Biography] The letter is like a sea. [Note] The reading is the same as containing. 【Lv Lizhi】Taiji letters are three into one. 【Rite·Lezhi】People communicate with yin and yang. [Jade articles] Armor also. letter
Source glyph
letter
Name meaning
: Generally refers to letters and envelopes; also refers to the meaning of inclusion, tolerance, and broadness.
函
hán
本义是“箭囊”。甲骨文和全
文的字形都是一个长方形或椭团
形的囊状物,在一边有一个可挂
在腰带上的小环。后引申为“封
套”、“信件”等。
回田 函 喝
письмо
Первоначальное значение - «колчан».
Все символы надписей на костях оракула и полный текст представляют собой капсулы прямоугольной или овальной формы с небольшим кольцом на одной стороне, которое можно повесить на пояс.
Позже его расширили на «конверт», «письмо» и так далее.
Напиток с письмом уитян
hán, xián
I сущ.
1) hán ящик, футляр (напр. для книги); конверт; ножны; колчан
书函 футляр для книги; конверт для письма
镜函 футляр для очков (зеркала)
2) hán официальное письмо; отношение (между равными инстанциями); бумага; в письме, в бумаге; письмом. письменно (сообщать)
函开 Ваше письмо распечатали и прочли, что...
来函 поступившее письмо (отношение)
3) hán * латы, панцирь; кольчуга; доспехи
函工 ремесленник по изготовлению доспехов, оружейник
4) xián отвислый подбородок; зоб
II hán
гл. А
1) класть (прятать) в футляр
函弓 спрятать лук в футляр
2) помещать; вмещать, содержать в себе, заключать, таить
民函阴阳之气 народ несёт в себе дыхание обеих сил природы (сил «инь» и «ян»)
席间函丈 между циновками можно поместить посох длиною и один чжан
гл. Б
вкладываться; вмещаться, умещаться; содержаться
函匣 умещаться в ящике
函吾中 содержится в нас (в естестве человека)
III hán собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 函谷关 Ханьгугуань (горный проход в пров. Хэнань)
函崤 горные проходы Ханьгугуань и Сяогуань
2) ист., геогр.* г. Чанъань
函洛 гг. Чанъань и Лоян
3) Хань (фамилия)

函

Значения

Ящик, коробка

Мнемоника

Деформировано. Рот с языком (в центре), который то высовывается, то убирается назад. В широком смысле — выдвижной или почтовый ящик, куда письма то кладут, то вынимают.
